column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥusayn. tawshīḥ man al-muḍāri‘ lilḥalbī
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raml al-māyah. qaṣīdah. basīṭ li’aḥmad al-‘arūsī

column2: in lam tu‘āyin tarāh al-‘ayn yā asafā
column3: aw lam tazurh fa’inn al-shawq zawwār

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ man al-hazaj
al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ mutadārakin li’abī al-ḥusn al-shshtrī

column2: yā sayyiduy yā rasūl al-lh khudhdh bīday
fa’ant nūr al-hudá fī kull kā’inatin
column3: wa’ant surr al-nadá yā khayr mu‘tamid

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ man manhūk al-khufayf
al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ man mashṭūr al-raml

column2: mā sabānī fī al-milāḥ ilā al-rasūl

column3: wasād khalqan faman fī al-khalq yaḥkīh
